title: Choco Hazelnut Mango Milkshake 🌰 || Cold Beverage
content:
Milkshake: Cold beverage  Servings: 2 Duration: 10 mins Milkshake is a cold beverage which is usually made from milk, ice cream/ ice cubes with fruits such as watermelon, musk melon, papaya, mango, orange 🍊 etc., to enhance the flavor and sweetness such as chocolate syrup, honey, butterscotch etc., Milkshakes are famous beverage all over world and easily available at restaurants. I thought Rather drinking every time at restaurant why can’t I prepare at home which is healthy and nutrition I got an idea of chocolate hazelnut Milkshake.. Kids special Milkshake with Choco cookie dough ice cream and milk which ended with full of flavours and toothsome to have it either breakfast/ evening. Especially for kids who is not at all show interest to drink milk this is the best way to make them drink. Once try and give this Milkshake to your kids I’m sure they will definitely ask you one more 😉 Im saying specially about kids because they don’t drink healthy food or eat fruits, my husband had & said it’s super tasty 😋. I’m happy 😊 so thought to share with you. I hope you enjoy this Milkshake which is nutritional and delicious. Nutrition facts: Ripe Mango :  One cup of diced mango contains the following:
  • fiber
  • protein
  • vitamin C
  • vitamin A
  • folate
  • vitamin B6
  • vitamin E
  • copper
  • vitamin K
  • potassium
Mangoes also provide calcium, iron, magnesium and powerful antioxidants. Today, I prepared Mango Milkshake with chocolate hazelnut rolled wafers Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients: Ripe Mango - 1 - pulp Choco cookie dough ice cream - 3 scoops Milk - 1 cup - cold Choco Hazelnut Rolled wafers - 4 Honey - 2 tb sp Procedure:
  • First cut Mango and take out pulp with spoon into a bowl
  • In a mixer grinder/ juicer add milk, ice cream, Mango pulp, 2 Choco Hazelnut rolled wafers & honey 🍯
  • Blend it till smooth / select Milkshake button on juicer
  • Serve it immediately & garnish with Choco Hazelnut Rolled wafers
  • Enjoy your day & Happy Cooking 😊
